snippet.title: Spekel Sparks: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Take off through the groves of Blooming Genesis with the charming assistance of brother foxes' Spekel and Bekel, and their friends, who decide to take matters into their own hands to stop the unruly and vicious A.C.E. Corporation from fully diving the world into a biochemical warfare with their nuclear creations! Try out each character and see which playstyle best fits you? Team up with friends and infiltrate their bases together!

The demo is now available to play on itch.io! Feel free to donate if you'd like to support the game! You can also join the Discord through here:
https://stellarsynthesizer.itch.io/spekel-sparks

Spekel Sparks has been in development since September of 2015. I've decided to finally unveil this project that's been worked on intermittently for a very long time. CrimsonPixel founded this project, and with my help we are making his dream of a multiplayer brawler a reality.

This game is planned to have a Steam page in the future. If you would like to receive future updates on this game, be sure to SUBCRIBE!
